title: Kid Tested, Parent Approved: Step2 Crabbie Sand Table
description:
Video Review of the all NEW Step2 Crabbie Sand Table by a Step2 Toy Tester. 

Enjoy all the fun of outdoor play with the Crabbie Sand Table by Step2! Kiddos can use the shovels and buckets to build their very own sand castle. This children’s sand table includes a shell style lid to keep sand clean and dry.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
Video Review of the all NEW Step2 Crabbie Sand Table by a Step2 Toy Tester. 

Enjoy all the fun of outdoor play with the Crabbie Sand Table by Step2! Kiddos can use the shovels and buckets to build their very own sand castle. This children’s sand table includes a shell style lid to keep sand clean and dry. To learn more about the Crabbie Sand Table, please click here: http://bit.ly/1PIWXD4 

Want to become a Step Toy Tester, like and follow us on Facebook to be notified when toy testing applications are posted - https://www.facebook.com/thestep2company/

transcripts: Thank you to Step2 for letting me test this item as part of the Step2 tester program. My boy loves to play with this. Making sand castles and we like that it comes with two shovels and two little buckets to play with. Perfect for when his cousin comes over so they can share and play together. That's the perfect size for us.
